headline: State-owned Stanwell reaches halfway mark on 1,200MWh BESS project in Queensland, Australia
summary_80w: The 300MW/1,200MWh Stanwell battery energy storage system (BESS) in Queensland, Australia, has reached its halfway construction milestone with the final Tesla Megapack units now delivered to the site.

headline: Is the outlook still bullish for US renewables?

headline: ABO Energy considers move to IPP model and public share offering
